members.member: This toggles the part failure highlight on and off (player initiated) [KSPEvent(active = false, guiActive = true, guiActiveUnfocused = false, externalToEVAOnly = false, guiName = "Toggle Failure Highlight")]

member.name: T:OhScrap.ModWrapper.FerramWrapper.DeploymentStates
member.summary: RealChuteLite - Parachute deployment states

member.name: P:OhScrap.StageRecoveryWrapper.StageRecoveryAvailable
member.summary: Check this to see if the addon is available. If this returns false, no additional API calls should be made!

member.name: P:OhScrap.StageRecoveryWrapper.StageRecoveryEnabled
member.summary: Check to see if StageRecovery is enabled. Returns false if unavailable or if user settings prevent SR from activating.

member.name: M:OhScrap.StageRecoveryWrapper.AddRecoverySuccessEvent(System.Action{Vessel,System.Single[],System.String})
member.summary: Adds a listener to the Recovery Success Event. When a vessel is recovered by StageRecovery the method will be invoked with the Vessel; an array of floats representing the percent returned after damage, funds returned, and science returned; and a string representing the reason for failure(SUCCESS, SPEED, or BURNUP)
member.param: The method to invoke when the event fires

member.name: M:OhScrap.StageRecoveryWrapper.RemoveRecoverySuccessEvent(System.Action{Vessel,System.Single[],System.String})
member.summary: Removes a listener from the Recovery Success Event

member.name: M:OhScrap.StageRecoveryWrapper.AddRecoveryFailureEvent(System.Action{Vessel,System.Single[],System.String})
member.summary: Adds a listener to the Recovery Failure Event. When a vessel fails to be recovered, the method will be invoked with the Vessel; an array of floats representing the percent returned after damage, funds returned, and science returned; and a string representing the reason for failure(SUCCESS, SPEED, or BURNUP)
member.param: The method to invoke when the event fires

member.name: M:OhScrap.StageRecoveryWrapper.RemoveRecoveryFailureEvent(System.Action{Vessel,System.Single[],System.String})
member.summary: Removes a listener from the Recovery Failure Event

member.name: M:OhScrap.StageRecoveryWrapper.AddRecoveryProcessingStartListener(System.Action{Vessel})
member.summary: Adds a listener to the OnRecoveryProcessingStart Event. When processing of the recovery status of a vessel starts the event will fire before any serious processing occurs.
member.param: The method to invoke when the event fires

member.name: M:OhScrap.StageRecoveryWrapper.RemoveRecoveryProcessingStartListener(System.Action{Vessel})
member.summary: Removes a listener from the OnRecoveryProcessingStart Event

member.name: M:OhScrap.StageRecoveryWrapper.AddRecoveryProcessingFinishListener(System.Action{Vessel})
member.summary: Adds a listener to the OnRecoveryProcessingStart Event. When processing of the recovery status of a vessel starts the event will fire before any serious processing occurs
member.param: The method to invoke when the event fires

member.name: M:OhScrap.StageRecoveryWrapper.RemoveRecoveryProcessingFinishListener(System.Action{Vessel})
member.summary: Removes a listener from the OnRecoveryProcessingFinish Event

member.name: M:OhScrap.StageRecoveryWrapper.ComputeTerminalVelocity(System.Collections.Generic.List{ProtoPartSnapshot})
member.summary: Computes the terminal velocity at sea level on the home planet (Kerbin/Earth) for the provided parts
member.param: The list of s to compute the terminal velocity for
member.returns: The terminal velocity as a scalar (speed)

member.name: M:OhScrap.StageRecoveryWrapper.ComputeTerminalVelocity(System.Collections.Generic.List{Part})
member.summary: Computes the terminal velocity at sea level on the home planet (Kerbin/Earth) for the provided parts
member.param: The list of s to compute the terminal velocity for
member.returns: The terminal velocity as a scalar (speed)
